Side Effects: Never had headaches. At 60 I am getting 2 migrain headaches at least 2 times a month that last at least 3 days. Other days I have very vague headaches on and off all day. Also lost some of my taste. I think this drug long term did some permanent damage. I'm not on an other medications .
Comments: My hips have not gotten better after 5 years of taking miacalcin. Just got a little worse. Not too much Improvement in bones.

Side Effects: don't have any side effects
Comments: I am 75 yrs old and didn't want to get on a harsh medicationthat would cause problems.   am satisfied I got a good one.

Side Effects: Hair Loss -It is getting really thin and everyone is noticing.  I am seeing a Dermatologist next week but may be too late for me?  I don't want to lose bone_ but I don't want to lose my hair either.  I am a female.
I'm taking Calcitonin Salmon_ same as Miacalcin_ and have had no side effects at all. What a relief after taking the awful Fosamax.
Painful pimples (whiteheads) that took forever to go away; mostly in my nostrils and eyebrows_ some in mouth. More sinus congestion.
Comments: Very expensive; I saw no improvement in the joints but the aggrivation and pain of the whiteheads convinced me not to finish the bottle. Wondering if others had this experience.

Side Effects: Severe pain and enlargemnet of the lympnodes. Pain in joints_ and so tired I could not exercise. Also_ all recent dental surger keeps getting infected and is painful
None
Comments: I really like taking Miacalcin. Its the only one that I don't get side effects. Has anyone had a bone scan and has it helped?

Side Effects: I experienced hair loss.  I found out this only happens in 1% of the people.  I really liked Miacalcin...had no other side effects.  Fosamax and Actonel made me violently ill.  I do not know what I am going to do now.  Doctor took me off Miacalcin only today.
No side effects at all. And I usually react to drugs. Easy to use nasal spray
Comments: Osteoporosis was worse_ not better_ after 1 year. Went to an osteoporosis specialist_ who said Miacalcin is not a very effective drug. Guess he was right. Basically threw away $500 in copays.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Easy to use. Had to stop Actonel after only 2 doses due to severe pain in esophagus and stomach.

Side Effects: None at all.
Comments: It is the only one I trust to take. I have no side effects at all.

Side Effects: None at all -- very easy to take...one spray in alternating nostrils at night.
Comments: I took Actonel and ended up with an ulcer. My doctor switched me to Miacalcin 3 years ago_ and my bone density has increased each year since_ going up 10% each year. I also walk 30 minutes most days_ and do PiYo (pilates/yoga hybrid) classes 3-5 hours each week. Also take 600 mg. calcium citrate + D each day.

Side Effects: just going into my 3rd month.  I have been experiencing sinus pressure in my nose_ I have a headache_ my pinky finger is throbbing_ my joints ache_ I cough at night and I feel flu-like.  These are the same symptoms I had with actonel when I took it.  My 3rd month I ended up in E.R with severe chills_ back and side pain.  It was terrifying.  This is my last chance before running out of drugs.  I wont take Evista either. I really want this Miacalcin to work_ but I don't know how much longer I can stand this.
none whatsoever
Comments: My mother had sever osteoporosis_ so I'm naturally concerned that I'll end up the same way. I take this nasal spray first thing in the morning. I also take 600mg Calcium Carbonate with Vitamin D with breakfast and dinner. I haven't gone for a followup bone scan yet_ but I can tell you that my loose teeth are now rock solid_ so I think it must be working. I had a terrible reaction to both Actonel and Evista and am glad to find something that has no side effects

Side Effects: None....in fact_ I have way fewer sinus problems in the years I have been using this spray.

Took Actonel first and got terrible stomach aches. Dr. put me on Miacalcin in April 06 . Not sure yet if it was from Miacalcin_ but I had severe pain in my legs and hips. Had difficulty getting up from a sitting position. Woke up numerous times during the night with terrible pain in legs and hips.I stopped taking it Monday and already I think I feel better_ at least I'm hoping. I just never thought the medication might be causing it. And I'm still not 100% sure that that is what was causing it.
Comments: I'm just on Combipatch HRT now and taking Calcium pills and a multivitamin every day. And watching my diet and trying to get more exercise. I'm hoping that is enough to stop the progression of this disease. Anyone else out there that had the same problem??

Side Effects: Headache_ flu-like symptoms_ joint pain_ particularly hip pain
Comments: Had to discontinue Fosamax due to severe jaw pain. Will be discontinuing Miacalcin because of severe hip pain.

Side Effects: No idea_ of course_ if it's from the Miacalcin_ but I've got a drippy nose and am extremely fatigued.
Dull headache not feeling like myself at all_ I had the shacks like I had to much caffeine. I do not dring anything with caffeine. I have tried Fosomax and Boniva I had to discontune bothe of them.
NONE SO FAR
Comments: had to stop taking actonel becaus eof severe esophagus irritation and gerd - what a nightmare that was

Side Effects: None
Comments: Doean't help bone loss in hips

Side Effects: None

so farI have had no side effects that I can relate to
Comments: you must take it every day_ it has helpt my bone density

Side Effects: so farI have had no side effects that I can relate to
Comments: I have been steriod dependent for 30 years or more_ and itwas perscribed for me to help bones as I was diagonised withosteoprosis due to the steriods.  I haven't had any more loss ofbone since I am on miacalcin.

Side Effects: I have been on Prednisone for 5 years due to an automimmune diesease and now have osteopenia.  Micacalcin seems to be working so far_ but want to know how everyone else is doing.
